Definition.Document:
Collaboration with Data Scientist

Objective

Use Machine Learning for earlier detection of bearing failure.

Starting Point

Engineers Analysis - all bearings

Time Range - Feb 11, 2004 - Feb 21, 2004

Analysis Steps

Engineer

1. Engineer shares analysis with data scientist

Data Scientist

2. Import spy (Seeq PYthon) library into python environment of choice (e.g., Amazon SageMaker, Azure Notebooks, or Seeq Data Lab)

3. Use spy.search() to find cleansed vibration bearing data and normal operation condition

4. Use spy.pull() to load the data into python

5. Develop and test machine learning model

6. Use spy.push() to send the results back to Seeq for the Engineer to view

  • Seeq DataLab project
  • Bearing Status
  • Bearing Abnormal Vibration

Engineer

7. Engineer reviews model output in Seeq (workstep)

8. Create dashboard to monitor bearing health (edit view or presentation view)

Additional Views

View for Enterprise Demo
